DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate immunogenicity safety GSK Biologicals ' HPV-16/18 vaccine administer accord alternative 2-dose schedule ( 0,6 month 0,12 month ) healthy 9-14 year old female compare standard 3-dose schedule ( 0,1,6 month ) 15-25 year old female .
